Why do open source licenses have a liability limitation notice?

2023-02-27

Well, suppose maybe you run into situations where in a comment or something it says: this code does X. then someone uses the code to feed starving orphans and then someone sues you for killing starving orphans because your code didn't work right. Even if they wouldn't win, maybe this is enough to not just automatically get summary judgement in your (the original author) favor causing massive legal expenses or settlement.
